alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leon County through 215 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Tallahassee Community College, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Leon Sinks, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood and Tallahassee Regional A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
